00044 /* Exported typedef ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00045 /** @defgroup SPI_MIDI_Exported_Types QSPI MIDI exported types
00046   * @{
00047   */
00048 typedef struct
00049 {
00050   u32 MIDICTRL_MODE;
00051   u32 MIDICTRL_CommandLength;
00052   u32 MIDICTRL_AddressLength;
00053   u32 MIDICTRL_ModeLength;
00054   u32 MIDICTRL_DummyLength;

00063 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00064 /** @defgroup SPI_Exported_Constants SPI exported constants
00065   * @{
00066   */
00067 #define QDIOEN_POS                              (22)
00068 #define SMDEL_POS                               (6)
00069 
00070 #define DOR_MODE                                (0UL << QDIOEN_POS | 1UL << SMDEL_POS )
00071 #define DIOR_MODE                               (1UL << QDIOEN_POS | 1UL << SMDEL_POS )
00072 #define QOR_MODE                                (0UL << QDIOEN_POS | 2UL << SMDEL_POS )
00073 #define QIOR_MODE                               (1UL << QDIOEN_POS | 2UL << SMDEL_POS )
00074 #define QPI_MODE                                (3UL << SMDEL_POS )
00075 #define SERIAL_MODE                             (0UL << SMDEL_POS )
00076 
00077 /* QSPI Flash Command Field Length -------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00078 #define MIDICTRL_CMDLENGTH_0                    ((u32)0x00000000)
00079 #define MIDICTRL_CMDLENGTH_1                    ((u32)0x01000000)
00080 #define MIDICTRL_CMDLENGTH_2                    ((u32)0x02000000)
00081 #define MIDICTRL_CMDLENGTH_3                    ((u32)0x03000000)
00082 #define MIDICTRL_CMDLENGTH_4                    ((u32)0x04000000)
00083 #define MIDICTRL_CMDLENGTH_5                    ((u32)0x05000000)
00084 #define MIDICTRL_CMDLENGTH_6                    ((u32)0x06000000)
00085 #define MIDICTRL_CMDLENGTH_7                    ((u32)0x07000000)
00086 #define MIDICTRL_CMDLENGTH_8                    ((u32)0x08000000)
00087

00166 #define MIDICTRL_DATALENGTH_28                  ((u32)0x0000001C)

00171 
00172 #define MIDICTRL_ON                             ((u32)0x00800000)
00173 #define MIDICTRL_OFF                            ((u32)0xFF7FFFFF)
00174 
00175 #define CMDVALUE_POS                            (8)
00176 #define MDVALUE_POS                             (0)
